title: Cute Hairpin
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>*Stare~*....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Hmm? What is it, Kasumi-chan? Why are you staring at my Senbei like that? Do you want some?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>It’s not that! The thing Kasumin is looking at is not your Senbei!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Phew. I only have one, so it not really something I could share all of<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>I was just thinking, “Chika-senpai’s clover hairpin is really cute huh~”!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Hairpin? Aren’t you also wearing a cute one, Kasumi-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Of course Kasumin’s hairpin is also cute! But yours is cute too~, Chika-senpai. If Kasumin were to wear that, Kasumin would also be cute~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Should we try swapping?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Can we!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Yeah it’s fine~. I also think your hairpin is cute, Kasumi-chan, so I want to try wearing it~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
